title: Holy God, We Praise Thy Name

lyrics.text:
Holy God, we praise thy name! Lord of all, we bow before thee! All on Earth thy sceptre claim,
All in Heav'n above adore thee; Infinite thy vast domain, Everlasting is thy reign.

Hark! the loud celestial hymn Angel choirs above are raising! Cherubim and seraphim,
In unceasing chorus praising, Fill the heav'ns with sweet accord; Holy, holy, holy, Lord!

Lo! the apostolic train Join thy sacred name to hallow! Prophets swell the loud refrain,
And the white-robed martyrs follow, And from morn to set of sun, Through the Church the song goes on.

Holy Father, holy Son, Holy Spirit, Three we name thee, Though in essence only one,
Undivided God we claim thee; And adoring bend the knee, While we own the mystery.

From thy high celestial home, Judge of all, again returning, We believe that thou shalt come
On the dreadful doomsday morning, When thy voice shall shake the earth, And the startled dead come forth.
